timeline.message:
CLDR-13576 Add Ligurian core data

Co-authored-by: Steven R. Loomis <srl295@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: If there is grammar info, check it, even if it's in seed. (there's no seed/supplemental/* )
timeline.author: srl295

timeline.bodyText:
Thought i fixed this before. Basically, this makes sure we get some details about what locales were missing, not just 'assert failed'.
The issue here was that this PR had incorrectly added lij to language80 coverage rules. That's no longer in this PR, but this makes sure that the resulting err is clear.
timeline.author: srl295

timeline.bodyText: we still assert, but print the warning first before bailing out
timeline.author: srl295
